Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
19.12.2012 SH SCR17150 Replace Factorlink(Temp) database by Factorlink database in DSQL box
30.06.2011 JH SCR16568 Fixed bug in Update v.TAXC and v.TAXC
23.06.2011 GB SCR16551 Extended condition for Select all TMIT
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902. Also redesigned TMIT selection.
26.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Replaced GSET_MARKCODE by GSBU_MARKCODE
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
06.05.2008 SH SCR133593 Removed test to call BPH107 only if a least one TMIT is
selected; Step3: Added test on CLNT612_VAT ='N'; Step5 Added test on
LDGR_NO_TAXAMOUNTS > 0 to call BAD013
16.11.2007 SH SCR113131 Step 2 Changed update of TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITH/AMOUNTCREDITH
04.10.2007 SH SCR12950 Step 1 Changed update of TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITH
13.06.2007 SH SCR12501 Update of PI.DATE with GSET_DATE(248) only if PI.DATE =
-- Updates v.PI.DATE

SQL_STMT_U.val: select TMIT_ADMNO, TMIT_CLNTNO, TMIT_DATE, TMIT_MONTHLYINVOICETYPE, TMIT_AMOUNTA1, TMIT_AMOUNTA2, TMIT_AMOUNTTOT, TMIT_CURRENCY, TMIT_AMOUNTH, TMIT_TAXAMOUNTH, TMIT_TOTAMOUNTH, ADMN_CURRENCY, ADMN_ADMNO_RATES from :1/TMIT, :1/ADMN, :1/CLNT where TMIT_DATE = ':2' and ADMN_NO = TMIT_ADMNO and ADMN_CURRENCY <> TMIT_CURRENCY and CLNT101_ADMNO = TMIT_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = TMIT_CLNTNO and CLNT203_OFFICE = 'RO' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Can't use LinkInnerJoin because table TMIN and CLNT are stored in different
databases
-- Perform final booking via BPH107 (always, also if no TMIT rows are selected,
maybe it's a restart)
-- Reset variiables
-- Step5 Charge tax
Step 2: Booking of exchange difference
-- There was a change in the exchange rate between EOM and booking date
-- Calculate tax
... update TMIT amounts

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(TMIN_AMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) as SUM_TMIN_AMOUNTC, cast(sum(TMIN_TAXAMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) as SUM_TMIN_TAXAMOUNTC, cast(sum(TMIN_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) as SUM_TMIN_AMOUNTH, cast(sum(TMIN_TAXAMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) as SUM_TMIN_TAXAMOUNTH from :1/TMIN where TMIN_ADMNO = :2 and TMIN_CLNTNO = :3 and TMIN_DATE = ':4' and TMIN_MONTHLYINVOICETYPE = :5 for fetch only
